description: This file defines a function that creates and configures a mock server using MSW (Mock Service Worker) for testing or development purposes. It distinguishes between Node (server-side) and browser environments and sets up the corresponding mock server or worker with predefined handlers.

methods.name: createMockServer()
methods.description: Creates and returns a mock server or worker based on the environment (Node or browser), with methods to start, stop, and reset handlers.
